1.0.4.en: when motion is detected using the thumbnail if exists.

1.0.7.en: #1 bug fix: controller not found when pairing with controller

1.0.8.en: Bug # 2 and # 3 have been resolved. It is now again possible to add a UnifiOS Protect controller and an easier solution for the snapshot url so that PiPup can be used.

1.0.9.en: Removed some events, make code cleaner, fix snapshot url bug

1.0.10.en: Snapshot url is now Homey Public cloud url and fixed memory leak

1.1.1.en: Cloud Key has been removed because of no functionality in the API.

1.1.2.en: access-key endpoint is removed from unifios devices

1.2.0.en: Connection flow created, Snapshot timesnap removed from UI, Latest snapshot image is retrieved from UnifiOS.

1.2.1.en: WebSocket support for faster motion triggers
